name: data.webuild.sg
description: store snapshot data for webuild.sg for events and repos

scripts.build:html: jade views/index.jade -o . -P && jade views/graphs/repos-per-week -o ./dataset/repos-per-week -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-week -o ./dataset/events-per-week -P && jade views/graphs/repos-per-programming -o ./dataset/repos-per-programming -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-group -o ./dataset/events-per-group -P && jade views/graphs/repos-most-active -o ./dataset/repos-most-active -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-day-of-week -o ./dataset/events-per-day-of-week -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-duration -o ./dataset/events-per-duration -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-time-of-day -o ./dataset/events-per-time-of-day -P
scripts.build:graph: node graphs && node graphs/reposPerProgramming && node graphs/eventsPerGroup && node graphs/reposPerWeek && node graphs/eventsPerWeek && node graphs/eventsPerTimeOfDay
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:graph
scripts.test: jshint graphs tasks test public/js && NODE_ENV=test mocha test --recursive && jsinspect ./tasks ./graphs -t 30
